name: Pokecard
description:
Welcome to PokeCard! A PokeCard is Card Game where you pokemon battle with your opponent, and earn points by attacking and defeating an opponent.

There will be also a chance to use legendary/rare pokemon to win the game

The game has a multiplayer feature

Future Plans
  • Special Card
  • Creating Team
  • CutScene/Cutimages
  • Background Music
Install Instructions

To install the game:

1. Download the file

2. Launch "pokecard.exe"
